# SWAttributionView.DisplayContext.detail

**Case**

Indicates that the attributed content shown along with this view is being actively consumed by the user.

## Declaration

```swift
case detail
```

## Context styles

- **SWAttributionView.DisplayContext.summary**: Indicates that the system is offering the attributed content shown along with this view to the user for consumption.

items.description: Indicates that the system is offering the attributed content shown along with this view to the user for consumption.
items.name: SWAttributionView.DisplayContext.summary
